column4: I installed Jaunty a week ago and found it to be very sluggish compared to Hardy (which I've got on the same machine - dual boot). I've had the same problem with Intrepid. I'm only running xfce without compiz. Can anyone advise me on what could be slowing my system down?
weren't there intel chipset regressions in 9.04?
no idea, but I am running an intel video chipset
can you cite a source for that?
